text:
Myron Curry, page two
SENATOR BOURKE B. HICKENLOOPER (Iowa) Saw Mr. George Pavick,
administrative assistant. Talked for 35 minutes. Called Nick
Zappel regarding ETV and Radio legislation. Listened careÂ¬
fully, took notes and NER's address and phone number. Accepted
kit. Will watch developments.
SENATOR C. P. HANSEN (R-Wyoming) Spoke with Mr. David
Dominick, administrative assistant. 10 minute interview.
Distant and perfunctory. Will relay kit and desire for attention
for inclusion of radio on to Senator.
